description:
Corrected Bridge Time Signature
Changed Guitar and Bass Bridge riff a bit
Edited Vocals at Interlude, Bridge and Outro
Fixed Drums Intro, Fast Riff and Bridge, and changed the cymbal at Interlude
title: Mr. Jack (Cd Version)

description:
Intro Clean Guitar is BACK!
Some Volume and BPM adjustments
Edited Interlude Vocals
Instruments order change
title: Mr. Jack (Cd Version)

description:
Edited BPM and Time Signatures
Deleted Clean Guitar, Switched the parts to Dist. Guitar
Reworked Vocal Hamonies, bridge Vocals Test
Bass intro has let rings
Volume Adjustments
title: Mr. Jack (Cd Version)

description:
Added Chord names and Note names to other Instruments
Changed Sections Bridge 1 to Interlude and Bridge 2 to Bridge 1
Added Let Rings and Legato Slides to the Bass
Added a Clean Guitar that plays the really high Notes during the Intro (that were previously the Ride Bell on Drums)
Clean Guitar changed to Overdriven Guitar, Intro is now how Daron plays it live (Serj was the one who played it like that before), replaced Slides with Legato Slides and added Let Rings to the Intelude
Different Riffs at Bridge
Added Bends to Vocals, details at the Verses, Corrected some Notes, Serj Vocals play lower octave during the beggining of the verse, removed Vibrato at the Choruses, different Notes at Bridge
Added Ambience Track to Emulate the sounds in the Intro
Volume Adjustments to make Serj Vocals sound louder
Some BPM Changes
Really wanted to come back to this after what's going on right now
title: Mr. Jack (Cd Version)

description: Added vocals with lyrics, Serj plays the guitar on the low strings, Daron with chords at the top of the neck, added a Clean Guitar that plays the intro and bridge, Bass intro is how Shavo plays it live, the end of the song was changed a lot!
title: Mr. Jack (Cd Version)
